website_summaries.verdict: A strong, versatile, and fireproof safe for the firearms enthusiast.
pros: The 12-gauge steel construction resists 1875°F for 60 minutes
20 x 1.5” steel bolts secure the door
Flexible storage including handgun holsters on door liner
Offers internal power outlets and USB ports
cons: Cannot be delivered to all areas, so check before ordering

customer_reviews.title: Really nice rifle safe!
customer_reviews.text: This safe is very nice. I really like the combination lock. However I was doing research and seen that it came from a safe company in S.C. So I ordered it thinking it was American made. When it was delivered, right on the box it say's made in China. My final thought on it is that is was a great buy, with little hassle because they delivered it to my front door! But it is not American made!
customer_reviews.author: Death Wooble

customer_reviews.title: works great, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It's a thing of beauty, works great, as advertised, highly recommend, AAAAA+++++
customer_reviews.author: Marian Cintula

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Very helpful customer service staff
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very helpful customer service staff. They answered all my questions and customized the safe perfectly to my specifications. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Simon L.

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made. I would not want to haul this up a flight of stairs and did not get it for weapons. IF our house is ever in a disaster, hopefully this will protect our important papers and favorite possessions.
customer_reviews.author: JeLF

customer_reviews.title: The "last mile" of delivery was not easy in my case
customer_reviews.text: The Steelwater customer service professionals have been a dream to work with. The "last mile" of delivery was not easy in my case, and they were simply wonderful at suggesting options to make it happen. First-class all the way.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wendell

customer_reviews.title: came as expected. dont buy it if you live ...
customer_reviews.text: came as expected. dont buy it if you live up a dirt driveway and have no way to get it from the street to your house. my guy helped me push it into garage. i have concrete driveway 35' from the street
customer_reviews.author: Eric Graham

customer_reviews.title: Nice safe!!
customer_reviews.text: Great item!!!!!! Love this safe!!!! Holds weapons well and works great for pistols and even a bow.
customer_reviews.author: Torazo M.

customer_reviews.title: little disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: not as heavy duty as expected. Had trouble with closing door. little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: louis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Safe wonderful delivery process. We'll be getting ,ore when needed
customer_reviews.author: Steeve Hives

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable shelves that are easy to rearrange
customer_reviews.text: Met our expect ions. Pre-wired for the Meets our expections.. Pre-wired. Adjustable shelves that are easy to rearrange. Would purchase again. Pre-wired. Adjustable shelves that are easy to arrange. We would purchase this safe Gain.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Best safe for the cost period
customer_reviews.text: I have been researching safes for a long time and this by far was the most secure safe for the amount that I was looking to spend. The fit and finish on the unit is excellent. I'm not going to say that it is impossible to break into provided that you had time and the right equipment but this safe is 100 times better than the box store crap that is being sold for nearly the same cost. The customer service from order to delivery and even after purchase (they returned my call for a question after hours within 10 minutes) was top notch by Steelwater.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Cheshire

product_meta.title: New and Improved E.M.P Proof Steelwater Heavy Duty 22 Long Gun Fire Protection for 60 Minutes AMLD593024-EMP
feature_bullets: NEW and IMPROVED E.M.P proof digital keypad with a high security, double bitted bypass key. Never be locked out of your safe. Interior LED Automatic Lighting Included- Logo'd Door Organized Kit Included - High Quality UL Listed Outlet with (3) 110 Volt A/C Plugs and (2) USB Ports. 60 Minute Fire Rated @ 1875˚F Dimensions: H59 x W30 x D24 - Double Sided U-Channel Steel Reinforced Top Long Shelf to Prevent Breakage and Warping

NEW and IMPROVED Interior LED Automatic Lighting Included - Logo'd Door Organizer Kit Included - High Quality UL Listed Outlet with (3) 110 Volt A/C Plugs and (2) USB Ports - Upgraded to (20) 1 ½” diameter solid steel locking bolts --8X Drill Resistant Hard Plate -

1 Hour Fire Protection up to 1875 degrees - Height 59" x Width 30" x Depth 24 " (+3" to depth for handle) - Gear Drive System (not cheap cam drive)--1/4" extra steel Reinforced Bolt Down Holes, Steel reinforced top shelf

PLEASE READ BEFORE PURCHASING: Undeliverable to New York with zip codes beginning in (100-104) & (110-119), some remote areas such as islands, areas accessible only by toll bridge or ferry service, union states, etc. Please contact us to verify. THIS PRODUCT IS SHIPPED BY TRACTOR TRAILER. Please read over shipping details to prevent delivery issues. Contact us for questions and/or other delivery options.
